name.label: name
name.prompt: Choose a name for the character.

description.label: description
description.prompt: Provide a description for the character.

attackPower.label: attackPower
attackPower.prompt: Enter an integer for the attack power.

defenseRating.label: defenseRating
defenseRating.prompt: Enter an integer for the defense rating.

magicPower.label: magicPower
magicPower.prompt: Enter an integer for the magic power.

resistanceRating.label: resistanceRating
resistanceRating.prompt: Enter an integer for the resistance rating.

ability1.label: ability1
ability1.prompt: Name a battle ability for this move slot. Prioritize a direct attack.

ability2.label: ability2
ability2.prompt: Name a battle ability for this move slot. Prioritize a strategic attack.

ability3.label: ability3
ability3.prompt: Name a battle ability for this move slot. Prioritize a delayed effect or battlefield effect.

ability4.label: ability4
ability4.prompt: Name a battle ability for this move slot. Prioritize a speed or targeted attack.

block.label: block
block.prompt: Name a block type ability for this move slot.

heal.label: heal
heal.prompt: Name a heal type ability for this move slot.

inventory.label: inventory
inventory.prompt: Name one to three special items this character can use during combat. Items may be consumable, one time use, or special equipment.

school.label: school
school.prompt: Choose which force this character is most proficient with: 'wood', 'fire', 'earth', 'water', 'metal'.

maxHealth.label: maxHealth
maxHealth.prompt: Enter an integer for the maximum health of this character.

maxEnergy.label: maxEnergy
maxEnergy.prompt: Enter an integer for the maximum energy of this character.

nature.label: nature
nature.prompt: Choose a nature for the character. Determined boosts attack. Burly raises defense. Curious enhances magic. Focused fortifies resistance.
